formdata.value:
Taitu Ethiopia tours are run by a group of experienced guides
All guides are involved during the selection and designing of our tours. Our guides apart from having years of experience and an extensive knowledge of, and passion for, the areas in which they work, they are well aware about the experience you look forward and the service you need before you set-off your foot from your home country – because they are also the part of the operation team.

Great opportunity for adventure & travels
Our services include domestic and international flight bookings, hotel reservations, car rentals, different safaris and tour packages. We also offer customized travel packages that are tailored as per client’s specific interest and time availability. Whether you are looking for adventure trips, camping safaris, family vacation, special interest tours and business trips, we have the expertise and experience to make your travel dreams a reality.
